instructions: Launch the Visual Voicemail app. Tap the picture icon to the left of the phone number you wish to add as a contact. Add new : Tap Create Contact . Edit : Once you tap the icon, the option to edit the contact appears. Follow procedures by device to create a new contact.

Tap Visual Voicemail . Tap the Menu button (three vertical dots). Change pin Tap Settings . Tap Change PIN . Enter the current PIN in the 'greetings in PIN' section. The default PIN is the last four digits of your phone number. To reset your PIN to the last four digits of your phone number, dial #793# on your device. Enter and confirm the new PIN. Tap OK . A confirmation message appears if the change was successful. Change the sort options Tap one of the following options: Sort alphabetically Sort by unviewed Delete multiple messages Tap the Trash Can icon at the top. Select all messages to delete. Tap Delete . Manually set the language Tap Settings . Scroll to the language section and select the active language. Select the desired language. Sync the inbox Tap the Menu button. Tap Refresh .

Tap Settings . Tap Change PIN . Enter the current PIN in the 'greetings in PIN' section. The default PIN is the last four digits of your phone number. To reset your PIN to the last four digits of your phone number, dial #793# on your device. Enter and confirm the new PIN. Tap OK . A confirmation message appears if the change was successful.
